#summary Examples of configs produced by tintwizard.

<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

=Example Config 1=
{{{
# Tint2 config file
# Generated by tintwizard (http://code.google.com/p/tintwizard/)

# For information on manually configuring tint2 see http://code.google.com/p/tint2/wiki/Configure

# To use this as default tint2 config: save as $HOME/.config/tint2/tint2rc

# Background definitions
# ID 1
border_width = 0
rounded = 0
background_color = #000000 100
border_color = #000000 100

# ID 2
border_width = 0
rounded = 0
background_color = #000000 100
border_color = #000000 100

# ID 3
border_width = 0
rounded = 0
background_color = #000000 100
border_color = #000000 100

# Panel
panel_monitor = all
panel_position = bottom left
panel_size = 0 0
panel_margin = 0 0
panel_padding = 0 0
panel_background_id = 0

# Taskbar
taskbar_mode = single_desktop
taskbar_padding = 0 0 0
taskbar_background_id = 0

# Tasks
task_icon = 1
task_text = 1
task_centered = 1
task_width = 0
task_padding = 0 0
task_background_id = 0
task_active_background_id = 0

# Fonts
task_font = Sans 12
task_font_color = #000000 100
task_active_font_color = #000000 100
font_shadow = 0

# Systray
systray_padding = 0 0 0
systray_background_id = 0

# Clock
time1_format = %H:%M%P
time1_font = Sans 12
time2_format = %A %d %B
time2_font = Sans 12
clock_font_color = #000000 100
clock_padding = 0 0
clock_background_id = 0

# Mouse
mouse_middle = none
mouse_right = none
mouse_scroll_up = none
mouse_scroll_down = none

# Battery
battery = 0
battery_low_status = 20
battery_low_cmd = notify-send "battery low"
bat1_font = Sans 12
bat2_font = Sans 12
battery_font_color = #000000 100
battery_padding = 0 0
battery_background_id = 0

# End of config
}}}
